Name: Zoning, 712 Myrtle Avenue, Brooklyn (N 230259 ZRK)
Title: Application number N 230259 ZRK (712 Myrtle Avenue) submitted by Joel Berkowitz, pursuant to Section 201 of the New York City Charter, for an amendment of the Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, modifying APPENDIX F for the purpose of establishing a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing area, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 3, Council District 33.

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
